entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
